price: Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye Muumba wa kila kitu, na Yeye ndiye Mlinzi juu ya kila kitu.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَكِيلٞ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu Muumba kila kitu - naye peke yake - ndiye Mlinzi wa kila kitu. Anaendesha mambo yake kwa mujibu wa hikima yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-lahu khāliqu kulli shayin wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin wakīlun
